Легендарная игра



9.8/10

This was an amazing game. With breath taking graphics, another well done story, and an environment that is very alive. Once again, you play as Gordon Freeman, this time in a world that is overrun by an alien race, as the result of the events of the first game, and is tasked to put a stop to it. The gameplay is more of the same from its predecessor, with some variety, and in a more open world. Although this game is, in a lot of ways, better than the first, I still do prefer the first. However, this one is still a classic nevertheless. 9.5/10

Как и ожидалось - продолжение саги о путешествиях физика - теоретика Гордона Фримена будет иметь довольно продолжительный, оригинальный и ни с чем не сравнимое продолжение. Как обычно, нашему любимому главному герою предстоит спасти ситуацию из полного краха, и при этом выжить. 
как обычно, с монтировкой в руках Гордон борется с различной нечистью - зомби и комбайнами и при этом старается спасти людей, подвергающихся полному геноциду со стороны Альянса - инопланетной организации, держащей под контролем данную территорию. 
Продолжительный и увлекательный сюжет, содержащий в себе юмор, перестрелки и множество оружия и кровопролития не оставит никого равнодушным. 
Увлекательный и фантастичный сюжет Half Life не оставит равнодушным никого.

FPS Completamente lineal
Buena historia donde no tomas ninguna desicion solo debes buscar el unico camino que existe y seguirlo matando lo que se te aparezca por delante o simplemente pasar muy rapido y ya (no con sigilo, este no existe).
Siempre habia terminado todos los juegos que tuve hasta este que me aburrio despues de intentarlo largo rato (jugue la mayor parte del tiempo offline asique las horas jugadas son mucho mas).
Debe haber sido muy bueno en su epoca pero ahora no se compara con buenos juegos actuales en ningun aspecto.
No me arrepiento de haberlo comprado ya que fue a solo tres dolares y los analisis eran demasiado buenos, imagino que es gente que les gusta los juegos basicos y simples sin ningun aporte o simplemente nostalgicos que le tienen cariño. Asi puedo quedarme tranquilo de constatar que este juego no es para mi ni para otros jugadores que buscan mas que solo ir para adelante y disparar.

Esse jogo é excelente, um dos melhores que já joguei nos ultimos 20 anos. O enredo, a ambientação, a jogabilidade, a trilha sonora, os gráficos... tudo é perfeito. O fato de não ser divido em fases, não ter telas de carregamento, nem cenas de corte, eleva a imersão que o jogo proporciona à níveis pouco alcançados pela maioria dos jogos modernos. As expansões são tão boas quanto o jogo principal, e mesmo depois de jogar tudo, você ainda vai ficar com vontade de jogar mais Half Life. 

Aguardando anciosamente o lançamento do Half Life 3.

Возвращение легенды с улучшенной графикой, крутой физикой и конечно атмосферной музыкой. Вас ждёт обалденный сюжет с крутыми персонажами. Оптимизация на высоком уровне так что я рекомендую всем купить эту игру.

No doubt about it, this game is one of the greatest games ever made. I loved every moment of it! It has be one of the greatest FPS games I've ever seen. This game kept me on the edge of my seat so many times... The graphics are also amazing due to the recent update. All the characters, areas, weapons, and ambience was just so well done. I really liked the first Half-Life but this game is a lot better. You can really see why the sequel to the first Half-Life took six years to release. Truly, this has be one of the greatest PC games ever made!

Yes, it's good. It's damn good. It's very damn good. It's so damn good, you might as well spend your money on this immediately. Half-Life 2 does everything right that Half-Life does... and then goes even further, doing an even more fantastic job with its story. The graphics and level-design are both very aesthetically pleasing, and the actors all do their job very well (Though the best voice actor would definitely have to be Dr. Freeman's. Very excellent job). And the story, like it's predecessor, tells it completely through animations and no cutscenes to be found, giving the game a nice steady flow. The game also has a great atmosphere. It can feel hopeless, empowering, and frightening at appropriate times. And the world that is created outside of Black Mesa labs is well shown and characterized, to be a very believable place. 

Honestly, I only have two very small qualms with this game and that would be the loading screens and occaisional glitches. I never found an actual in-game glitch in graphics or animation, but rarely the sound would cut out of a random NPC's dialogue. And for a game that flows so well, the loading screen for the next section of a level can bring all that build-up to a halt. But these are only minor problems, that didn't take away all that much from how great the game is. Half-Life 2 is definitely one of the best video games I've ever played, and I can guarantee it'll be one of the best games you'll ever play as well. I cannot recommend this game enough.

3/3 Need Half Life 3

Do you want to know one cool thing that video games have over, say, film?
Since gaming has only really tried it's hand at artistic merit in recent years, going through the classics doesn't feel like work. Enter Half-Life 2, a prime example: considered almost unanimously to be one of the best and most influential games of all time, you don't play to the end to join the 'gaming elite' (well, I don't anyway; I don't know you), you play to the end because it's fun. Great fun. Inventive, thrilling, visually wonderful, technologically innovative, mind-bogglingly well-crafted, perfectly, slightly overrated, fun.
   To this day, it's one of the most entertaining experiences you can have in the medium of ones and zeroes. Essential.

Half Life 2 - казалось бы не слишком замысловатое название для великой игры.Игры поставивщей новую планку для развития всей игровой индустрии и шутеров в частности. Думаю, в мире нет почти ни одного человека, который бы не слышал про эту игру. Она заманивает сюжетом и атмосферой, которые увлекают вас прямо до финальных титров: расказывать про процесс прохождения нету смысла - вы сами должны это пройти - от гонимого зверя в клетке до выживщего в заброшеном городе, от выжевщего в зомбиапокалипсисе до борца с системой. Каждый пройдя ее почувствует, что-то чего не ошушал в других шутерах да и играх вообще. Имперский лайк, рекомендую.

EDIT  like 3 years later:
lmao, scratch that. the og half-life is superior. this simply doesn't compare to hl1's atmosphere, story and level pacing in any way. Now this isn't a bad game at all. The physics are still great, the shotgun is one of my favorite guns and the gravity gun is fun as hell. Also, there is undeniably a sense of world that's "alive", but I didn't notice the charm of hl1 and I sure did get bored playing this a lot more often than I did in the previous game.

Also RIP half-life 3!
